resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11769#issuecomment-978784681


   Looks we should increase MacOS CI job time limit.
   It's currently set to 45min [1]. A recent successful test finishes in 43min [2].
   
   [1] https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/.github/workflows/cpp.yml#L120
   [2] https://github.com/apache/arrow/runs/4315087429?check_suite_focus=true

fields.description: Some Parquet decoders make use of {{BitmapReader}} when decoding data with missing values. {{BitBlockCounter}} or {{BitRunReader}} might actually be more efficient.
fields.summary: [C++] Review uses of BitmapReader in Parquet decoders
